text:
@realDonaldTrump DRUGS INCREASE ACE2 THAT IS NEEDED BY SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19 Coronavirus) TO ATTACH AND INFECT CELLS of lung, blood vessel.

The more ACE2, the more infection. This may be the reason why elderly treated with these drugs, have high death / severe side effects. SAVE LIVES https://t.co/EpxWpqrLg6
